enemy.data.leaflet.name: Leaflet
enemy.data.leaflet.description.visuals: Very tiny creature with a green body covered with tree leaves. Holding a shield made of intertwined tree leaves. The other hand is carrying a spear. He is wearing a mask made of tree bark. Mask hiding its face made of blue transluscent petals. A transparent blue smoke made of small bubbles is emanating from behind the mask.
